name: Bellossom
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokemon. This power can't be used if Bellossom is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads. Bellossom is now Asleep.

name: Espeon
Attack1Text: Move up to 4 damage counters from any of your Pokemon to any of your opponent's Pokemon in any way you like.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Forretress
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: Does 30 damage times the number of Pineco and Forretress you have in play. This attack does 30 damage to each of your Pineco and Forretress in play.

name: Gliscor
Attack1Text: If, before Gliscor does damage, the Defending Pokemon has no damage counters on it and is then damaged by this attack (after applying Weakness and Resistance), the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Houndoom
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Fighting Pokemon in play, this attack does 20 damage plus 60 more damage.
Attack2Text: Your opponent discards a card from his or her hand.

name: Magcargo
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned.
Attack2Text: You may discard any number of Fire Energy cards attached to Magcargo. If you do , this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage for each Fire Energy card you discarded.

name: Smeargle
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Smeargle is your Active Pokemon, you may look at your opponent's hand. If you do, choose a Supporter card you find there and use the effect of that card as the effect of this power. This power can't be used if Smeargle is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Togekiss
Attack1Text: Remove all damage counters from each of your Pokemon. Shuffle Togekiss and all cards attached to it back into your deck.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Umbreon
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects, including damage, done to Umbreon by attacks from your opponent's Pokemon that has any Poke-Powers or Poke-Bodies.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 damage.

name: Dodrio
AbilityText: As long as Dodrio is on your Bench, your Active Pokemon's Retreat Cost is ColorlessColorless less.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Drifblim
Attack1Text: Drifblim does 20 damage to itself.
Attack2Text: Shuffle Drifblim and all cards attached to it back into your deck. Then, your opponent shuffles the Defending Pokemon and all cards attached to it into his or her deck. (You choose your new Active Pokemon first.)

name: Forretress
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: You may switch Forretress with 1 of your Benched Pokemon. If you do, your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

name: Hariyama
Attack2Text: You may do 80 damage plus 20 more damage. If you do, Hariyama does 20 damage to itself.

name: Honchkrow
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon that has any damage counters on it. This attack does 50 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Honchkrow
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Darkness Pokemon in your discard pile.

name: Leafeon
Attack1Text: Does 50 damage damage times the number of Special Conditions affecting the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Metagross
Attack2Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

name: Mismagius
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Look at your opponent's hand. This attack does 30 damage times the number of Trainer, Supporter, and Stadium cards in your opponent's hand.]

name: Rotom
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may switch 1 of your face-down Prize cards with the top card of your deck. This power can't be used if Rotom is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage for each Energy attached to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

name: Skarmory
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Metal Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Tropius
Attack1Text: Remove 6 damage counters from 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Vespiquen
AbilityText: Prevent all damage done to your Benched Grass Pokemon by attacks.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, Vespiquen's Retreat Cost is 0.

name: Vileplume
AbilityText: Each player can't play any Trainer cards from his or her hand.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Weavile
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you play Weavile from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, you may look at your opponent's hand. Choose a card from your opponent's hand and discard it.
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokemon.

name: Flareon
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to Flareon.

name: Gloom
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 Special Condition. The Defending Pokemon is now affected by that Special Condition.

name: Jolteon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Jolteon during your opponent's next turn.

name: Lairon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your discard pile for a Metal Energy card and attach it to Lairon.

name: Metang
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.

name: Muk
Attack1Text: Switch the Defending Pokemon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. The new Defending Pokemon is now Confused and Poisoned.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Pinsir
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Raichu
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Raticate
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Discard a Special Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Sableye
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for any 1 card, show it to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck.
Attack2Text: If you have more cards in your hand than your opponent, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Scyther
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, if Scyther would be damaged by an attack, flip a coin. If heads, prevent that attack's damage done to Scyther.

name: Skuntank
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Slowbro
Attack1Text: Remove all Special Conditions and 3 damage counters from Slowbro.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused. If tails, Slowbro is now Confused.

name: Togetic
Attack1Text: Search your deck for any 1 card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage done to Togetic during your opponent's next turn.

name: Unown
AbilityText: Once during your turn, when you put Unown from your hand onto your Bench, you may search your deck for a Darkness Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Vaporeon
Attack1Text: Remove 2 damage counters from Vaporeon.
Attack2Text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Aron
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Beldum
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Combee
Attack1Text: If Vespiquen is on your Bench and has any damage counters on it, this attack does 20 damage plus 60 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Doduo
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Drifloon
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Drifloon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, switch the Defending Pokemon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon.

name: Eevee
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokemon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Gligar
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

name: Grimer
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokemon's Retreat Cost is Colorless more.

name: Hitmonchan
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attack, including damage, done to Hitmonchan during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Houndour
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Makuhita
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each heads.

name: Mawile
Attack1Text: Look at the top card of your deck. You may put it into your hand. If not, discard it and draw a card.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed and discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Misdreavus
Attack2Text: Each player draws 3 cards.

name: Murkrow
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at the card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

name: Oddish
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Grass Pokemon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Pikachu
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Pineco
Attack1Text: During your next turn, Pineco's Surprise Attack attack's base damage is 80.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Scyther
Attack2Text: During your next turn, Scyther can't use Slashing Strike.

name: Slowpoke
Attack1Text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Choose as many Basic Pokemon as you like and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: Slugma
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard the top card of your deck. If that card is a Fire Energy card, attach it to Slugma. This power can't be used if Slugma is affected by a Special Condition.

name: Sneasel
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin for each of your Pokemon in play. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Stunky
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Togepi
Attack1Text: Ask your opponent if you may draw 2 cards. If yes, draw 2 cards. If no, this attack does 20 damage to the Defending Pokemon.
